channel.title: [Feedback] Knight's Guard
channel.description:
We had a little Discussion in Discord earlier about how the Knight's Sacrifice works.
**Following Situation:**
_Person [1]_ is circled by **Sorcerer**. _Person [2]_ is **Physician** and heals _[1]._ _Person [3]_ is a **Knight** and guards _[2]_
**The outcome:**
[1] gets healed. [2] lives cause guarded. [3] gets attacked. Sorcerer lives.
This makes no sense to me. I would suggest to change the Knight's Ability Description so he only guards when his target gets visited by an attacker directly.

item.description:
Had no clue this was the case, but ToS struggles from the same coding with their Bodyguard. I agree 100% that the Knight should only guard if their target is attacked, not if they walk into an attack at another player’s room.
